features.name: Authentication
features.description: User authentication system with login, signup, logout, and session management using JWT tokens

features.name: Project Management
features.description: Create, load, save, delete, and manage user projects with file trees stored in MySQL database

features.name: Code Editor
features.description: Monaco Editor integration with Python syntax highlighting, code completion, and real-time editing with auto-save

features.name: File Management
features.description: Create, delete, rename, and organize files and folders within projects using file explorer

features.name: Code Execution
features.description: Execute Python code directly within the editor using Node.js spawn, capture output, handle errors, and auto-install packages

features.name: AI Code Assistant
features.description: AI-powered chat assistant using Google Gemini for code explanations, error fixes, optimization, and code generation

features.name: Terminal
features.description: Integrated terminal for running shell commands, installing packages, and managing Python environment

features.name: File Upload
features.description: Upload files to projects with drag-and-drop support, file type validation, and automatic integration into project file tree

features.name: Database Persistence
features.description: Save and load projects, files, and user data from MySQL database with JSON file tree storage

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Marketing landing page with hero section, features, pricing, testimonials, FAQ, and navigation

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: User dashboard showing project list, statistics, credits, and quick access to features

features.name: Admin Panel
features.description: Administrative dashboard for managing users, viewing statistics, and system administration

features.name: State Management
features.description: Centralized state management using Zustand for editor state, projects, files, chat history, and user data
